response.overview: In his latest NSFW experimental music video NY-based Russian artist and writer Slava Mogutin pays a tribute to the acclaimed Canadian queercore filmmaker Bruce LaBruce and his classic Hollywood influences. Mr. LaBruce shaves boysâ€™ heads and indulges himself in watersports while singing Moon River (music by Henry Mancini, lyrics by Johnny Mercer), first performed by Audrey Hepburn in Breakfast at Tiffany's (1961), directed by Blake Edwards.
response.title: Moon River
